Author: phm87#7395
Content: About how to enhance pings in the SH region, I wrote one idea (to discuss) inside my proposal : in addition to the NN server, have 1 node in SH with all assetchains, similar setup in AR and a private high speed connection between the 2 (vRack of ovh). I already used this technique to support some coin networks. The aim is to have a very tiny ping between AR and SH in order to enhance whole SH region connectivity. I have other ideas. (I won't do anything without community approval)

Author: phm87#7395
Content: I discussed this idea with @metaphilibert . Idea can be good if it helps everybody. Idea is not good if it helps only my (possible future) NN. The aim is to help whole SH region to enhance connectivity of whole network
